amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Housing Opportunities for Persons with Aids program by $18 million and decreases National Science Foundation funding accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $18 million (to $250 million) the bill's appropriation for the HOPWA program. The offset comes in the form of a reduction in funding for NSF polar research by an equal amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
